name: Breanna Crockett
text: Great food and great service! The restaurant is a little run-down, but overall a great family restaurant.

name: Makenzy Mathis
text: Carryout is always best!

name: Katie Gallup
text: I ordered a pizza and cheese sticks. Cheese sticks were really good. Pizza was the worst pizza I've ever had and was made very sloppy. There was also black hair on one of the slices of pizza and i have blonde hair. Probably won't order pizza here again.

name: jake wallis
text: Food was 30 minutes late. I was then told after I had to call the restaurant I would get a coupon for my time waiting and I never received that. I then get my food and it has no salad dressing I asked for and my wings I ordered was not made …More

name: The charismatic Cult leader
text: Everytime we order, never failing they are always out of something from dough to pasta. If they don't have a topping they don't take the price off if it was a extra topping, plus employees can't answer questions without asking a manager

name: Kitty Brodie
text: Best ever super friendly people thanks best wings in town

name: Debbie Myers
text: Very poor CUSTOMER service! I was spoken rude to on the phone.  They also made me feel like it was my fault that my order was messed up a week ago. I had taken a video the night we picked up our order because I couldn't believe the way it …More

name: William Tuggle
text: Not that good. Never enough pizza out during buffet. Frequently don’t get drink refills. Comparing all Pizza Huts, this one leave a lot to be desired.

name: Rita Jones
text: Ate here on Sunday. Service was very good and the environment is clean. The salad bar was not as expected in it did not include most salad offerings. There were no radishes, tomatoes or cucumbers and the carrots looked like they had been …More

name: Josh Gargus
text: Not a big fan of Pizza Hut because of the inconsistency from pizza to pizza on being cooked but this store has been very good each time we have ordered since we moved here in June!! This store has the consistency down in my opinion. Can you spread that to other stores?

name: Norfolk Southern
text: Centralia Mo. Pizza Hut, one of the last really good ones around.

name: Austin Burton
text: The delivery policies at this store change more than I change my socks. Changing from delivering no problem a month straight, to all of a sudden my address disappearing from their system, and they can’t deliver to my house. …More

name: Angela Stewart
text: Called to ask a question.  Told the woman that I was going to order online but had a couple questions,  she hung up on me.  She didn't understand what I was trying to say since she barely spoke English herself.

name: Cyerr Adams
text: It was delicious food and was worth the little wait. The food was way better then I paid for it. I was so glad I came here. I left with a full stomach and can't wait to come back!!!

name: Mary
text:
3 attempts to phone an order was totally unsuccessful, kept losing my call. Last time we ordered, was over charged and ended up with someone  else's order. No longer worth it. Last Taco pizza had no sauce, just veggies thrown on a crust,  no cheese.  YUCK
.

name: Bologna Boy
text: Good pizza!

name: bobbie stark
text: 35 minutes after we place our order the server came and apologized for the wait, she informed us at that time she would not be charging us for our salads. 10 minutes later, 45 minutes after we order,  we are told that they ran out of Lg pan …More

name: Dylan Kempker
text: Good service and they also had their Mexican style pizza out this time for buffet.

name: James Krewson
text: Pizza delivery is fast! I ordered on my app and it arrived in 15 minutes! The quality at the Centralia Pizza Hut matches that of the ones I have visited in Columbia.  Their classic pan pizza is very delicious and their delivery drivers are friendly.

name: Karen Abercrombie
text: Pizza was horrible. Way too much sauce. Garlic bread was hard

name: Elizabeth Browning
text: I won't go back to pizza hut. The people there was rude. And had a aditude. Was very hateful. They need someone to teach them some manners.

name: Alexis McCaul
text: Tried to call on a Friday at about 7 30 pm...on hold first time for over ten minutes hung up called back on hold for almoat another five min when the phone was picked up and then i was clearly hung up on when it went dead right away. …More

name: Gary Patterson
text: Went in to Pizza Hut in Centralia, mo. Saturday night the 13th 7:30 p.m. salad bar was already down, I ordered  iced tea they had dumped it already, they didn't have any tea bags to make new batch of tea,  got up with my 13 family members …More

name: Nicole Harvey
text: Our delivery order had multiple items that came with sauces and we didn't get a single sauce at all in the entire order. The pizza was good, delivery was on time, but would've been better if they'd remembered the sauces. We just moved to …More

name: Aundrea Clark
text: The online prices are different than the “over the phone” prices. By at least $2-$3. And when you call and ask questions, kindly, all they give you is attitude. Too expensive for terrible service

name: Wendy Lochrie
text: The Pizza Hut in Centralia is fast with friendly service. The pizza is cooked exactly the way you want it with great specials thrown in! They have a party room in the back for larger groups and are handicap accessible.

name: Caitlin Spears
text: Seems like it is getting better. Have had issues in the past, but seems like they are getting better.

name: Shayne
text: Horrible service. We were there 35-40 mins and not once did we get offered refills. They failed to let us know the buffet was ending in 5 mins and never even offered to let us order food.

name: Ebony Henry
text: As incompetent as they are rude

name: Chris Freeman
text: Very understanding. Some very good workers. Accidentally messed up an order but totally redeemed themselves with a discount. I'd definitely eat here again.

name: shirley Goodman
text: Was best service and food

name: Ethan Peyton
text: We had the buffet today, and I am pleased to say that our service was outstanding.  There was no time when the buffet was empty of pizza, and our server was friendly. …More

name: Jeremy Rounds
text: Super fast service y'all did it again!!!

name: Chris Herring
text: Really quick on-line order and pizza was excellent!  Centralia Mo restaurant.

name: Nicole Bentley
text: Waited two hours for pizza delivery because they lost our order not once but twice! Then told us they would put a credit on our account but didn't! I will never order from them again!

name: Judy Hammett
text:
Had to get own silverware, tomatoes on salad bar were rotten.waitress never checked back. Waited forever and ask 2 times for drink refill.
Bad experience!!

name: Paul Dean
text: Great service and food as usual.

name: C B
text: Ordered a few days ago and got a meal deal delivered to my kids at home while I was at work. Never recieved our soda. So i called and was told the money i paid for the soda would be credited to my account. Go in to eat tonight expecting to …More

name: Scott Smeltser
text: Quality has gone down in the past 40 years.

name: Roberta Deornellis
text: It was ok. Hasn't  change much. The pizza is what I  remember ss I  haven't been  there for awhile. Same salad bar. Nothing to write home about.

name: Chris Jones
text: Pizza bar not even stocked or salad bar at 12 and only 5 customers in the store and one of the employee's kids 2 of them running on TOP of the chairs in back dining room and running the store throughout the restaurant …More

text: Service wasn't great new server other little odds and ends that could have been better but management did a pretty good job give him a pat on the back

name: Linda Roberts
text: Went to lunch at Pizza hut on Centralia today. The pizza was good several different types of pizza thick & thin both

name: kathrine austin
text: Our server named Nicole was very rude. We didn't get straws or plates for our pizza. And when she asked if we needed anything else before we left, we asked for to-go boxes which she never returned with. Also never smiled or said your welcome when I thanked her. Very unfriendly.

name: Paul Gray
text: Good clean nice service

name: Kelli Elliott
text: We walked in and were told to sit down. Four tables followed within the next  10 min.  All 4 have gotten drinks and a waitress to their table. We have not even had someone look at us since we were told to " sit anywhere well be right there" …More

name: Madison Allen
text: Took FOREVER, got my order wrong, then had to call the store on MY phone because she didn’t know what she was doing.

name: Jess Asher
text: I've always order delivery online. My order the last 5 times has not be correct. I've been shorted items or get the wrong thing. The only reason this place still has customers is because its the only place in town.

text: The service has been very lacking in the past 6 or so months. Plan to wait for your food and get plenty of attitude from them if anything is wrong and you want it corrected.
